conbody.p: T24 Data editor provides a view-only feature to a T24 Data record. This is required since T24 Basic plug-in provides connectivity to the RTC Source control system where data records are to be checked-out for changes and returned back to source control. This editor has buttons to perform operations such as retrieving the record from a remote T24 environment and releasing the record into a remote T24 environment.

p.note: In windows environment, 'Get from T24' and 'Send to t24' works only in SFTP protocol.
